welcome_message_body: Welcome to Blue Springs, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful parks and outdoor activities, we invite you to explore our thriving community and enjoy everything it has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport houses check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
